gui

Class WindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.WindowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class WindowController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    JFrames class. Is intended that all JFrames are initiated, but only the desired ones are shown. Default visible JFrame is FrameMain.
